title: [BUG] Animation fails to load in .NET Maui application
body:
**Description**

I am trying to run a .NET Maui application with the SKLottieView. But no matter what I try it fails to display the animation and AnimationFailed event is called.

**Code**

See attached solution.

**Expected Behavior**

Lottie animation shows and plays.

**Actual Behavior**

Lottie animation does not show and AnimationFailed is fired.

**Basic Information**

See attached solution.


[LottieMauiSkia.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/files/9071813/LottieMauiSkia.zip)
